newsitem.title: USA: Oracle, Digital in video server pact.
newsitem.headline: Oracle, Digital in video server pact.

text.p: Oracle Corp and Digital Equipment Corp said Monday they agreed to a video server development pact.

The companies said in a joint statement they would develop Oracle's Video Server on Digital's 64-bit AlphaServer platforms to deliver video for customers in the broadband, intranet and Internet markets.

As part of the agreement, Oracle will use Digital's AlphaServer systems as a primary development platform for Oracle Video Server, the software that allows customers to deliver video and audio to PCs, network computers, workstations and set-top boxes over a variety of networks.
The companies said they would offer a migration program for current Digital Mediaplex customers who wish to move to Oracle Video Server.
